channel.title: Game crashes when I die firing tau cannon
channel.description: It's happened several times already, I didn't see a post on it on the first 2 pages, so here it is. All in the title. Doesn't seem to crash if I simply have the cannon out, only when I'm firing. Specs: 3 Ghz Core 2 duo 4 Gb RAM 1 Gb EVGA GeForce GTX 460, Driver version 9.18.13.697 Windows 7 Ultimate Not sure which of these MDMP files is the correct one, so here's both haha. Having a blast, great job guys! No wonder Half-Life is the most influential FPS ever! Back to gaming! hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_24T7_22_14C0.mdmp (84.3 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_24T9_5_55C0.mdmp (84.7 KB)

item.title: Game crashes when I die firing tau cannon
item.dc:creator: Narcoleptic
item.description:
It’s happened several times already, I didn’t see a post on it on the first 2 pages, so here it is. All in the title. Doesn’t seem to crash if I simply have the cannon out, only when I’m firing.

Specs:

3 Ghz Core 2 duo
4 Gb RAM
1 Gb EVGA GeForce GTX 460, Driver version 9.18.13.697
Windows 7 Ultimate

Not sure which of these MDMP files is the correct one, so here’s both haha.

Having a blast, great job guys! No wonder Half-Life is the most influential FPS ever! Back to gaming!
hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_24T7_22_14C0.mdmp (84.3 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_11_24T9_5_55C0.mdmp (84.7 KB)
